seed_pair.target: Quien sea que dijo que sería difícil tenía absolutamente razón.
seed_pair.known: Whoever said it would be difficult was absolutely right.

S0534: No vayamos afuera con este clima espantoso.
Let's not go outside in this dreadful weather.
S0535: Hizo una promesa de que no elegiría el trabajo equivocado.
He made a promise that he wouldn't choose the wrong job.
S0536: Solía pensar que ser loco era malo.
I used to think that being crazy was bad.
S0538: No quiero parecer como si no me importara.
I don't want to seem as though I don't care.
S0540: No me importa si quieres irte sin el coche.
I don't mind if you want to leave without the car.
S0541: Es una buena idea intentar respirar despacio.
It's a good idea to try and breathe slowly.
S0542: Cuando sea que te sientas enojado.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary

_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
